Welcome to my personal website! If you would like some to hire me for programming, web development, or web design don't hesitate to email me.

About

I live in Manhattan, KS with my wonderful fiancé Katie Phillips and work part-time as a Java web developer for ACEware Systems.

I plan on graduating K-State in December, 2012 with Bachelors in Information Systems and a minor in Business.

During my time at college I have discovered my passion for programming and more specifically web development. I enjoy both client and server side technologies and strive to build usable, clean, and functional websites.
